TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AccessibilityService extends Android.App.Service

Docs.summary: Accessibility services should only be used to assist users with disabilities in using Android devices and apps.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool DispatchGesture (Android.AccessibilityServices.GestureDescription gesture, Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityService.GestureResultCallback? callback, Android.OS.Handler? handler);

.method public hidebysig instance bool DispatchGesture(class Android.AccessibilityServices.GestureDescription gesture, class Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityService/GestureResultCallback callback, class Android.OS.Handler handler) cil managed

Docs.param: The gesture to dispatch
The object to call back when the status of the gesture is known. If null, no status is reported.
The handler on which to call back the callback object. If null, the object is called back on the service's main thread.
Docs.summary: Dispatch a gesture to the touch screen.
Docs.returns: true if the gesture is dispatched, false if not.

MemberSignature.Value: abstract member FindFocus : Android.Views.Accessibility.NodeFocus -> Android.Views.Accessibility.AccessibilityNodeInfo override this.FindFocus : Android.Views.Accessibility.NodeFocus -> Android.Views.Accessibility.AccessibilityNodeInfo
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.Accessibility.AccessibilityNodeInfo FindFocus(valuetype Android.Views.Accessibility.NodeFocus focus) cil managed

Docs.param: The focus to find. One of AccessibilityNodeInfo#FOCUS_INPUT or AccessibilityNodeInfo#FOCUS_ACCESSIBILITY.
Docs.summary: Find the view that has the specified focus type.
Docs.returns: The node info of the focused view or null.

MemberSignature.Value: abstract member OnKeyEvent : Android.Views.KeyEvent -> bool override this.OnKeyEvent : Android.Views.KeyEvent -> bool
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnKeyEvent(class Android.Views.KeyEvent e) cil managed

Docs.param: The event to be processed.
The event to be processed. This event is owned by the caller and cannot be used after this method returns. Services wishing to use the event after this method returns should make a copy.
Docs.summary: Callback that allows an accessibility service to observe the key events before they are passed to the rest of the system.
Docs.returns: If true then the event will be consumed and not delivered to applications, otherwise it will be delivered as usual.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetGestureDetectionPassthroughRegion (int displayId, Android.Graphics.Region region);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetGestureDetectionPassthroughRegion(int32 displayId, class Android.Graphics.Region region) cil managed

Docs.param: The display on which to set this region.
the region of the screen.
Docs.summary: When AccessibilityServiceInfo#FLAG_REQUEST_TOUCH_EXPLORATION_MODE is enabled, this function requests that touch interactions starting in the specified region of the screen bypass the gesture detector.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetTouchExplorationPassthroughRegion (int displayId, Android.Graphics.Region region);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetTouchExplorationPassthroughRegion(int32 displayId, class Android.Graphics.Region region) cil managed

Docs.param: The display on which to set this region.
the region of the screen .
Docs.summary: When AccessibilityServiceInfo#FLAG_REQUEST_TOUCH_EXPLORATION_MODE is enabled, this function requests that touch interactions starting in the specified region of the screen bypass the touch explorer and go straight to the view hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void TakeScreenshot (int displayId, Java.Util.Concurrent.IExecutor executor, Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityService.ITakeScreenshotCallback callback);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void TakeScreenshot(int32 displayId, class Java.Util.Concurrent.IExecutor executor, class Android.AccessibilityServices.AccessibilityService/ITakeScreenshotCallback callback) cil managed

Docs.param: The logic display id, must be Display#DEFAULT_DISPLAY for default display.
Executor on which to run the callback.
The callback invoked when taking screenshot has succeeded or failed. See TakeScreenshotCallback for details.
Docs.summary: Takes a screenshot of the specified display and returns it via an AccessibilityService.ScreenshotResult.

Docs.summary: Gets the windows on the screen of all displays.
